about_the_game:
So, you think you know match-3 games, huh? Get ready to be baffled! Learn to move, and then match, combo and morph your way to massive high scores and the highest heights on the leaderboards. This is where your smarts meet agility!

At its core, Meta Match is a match-3 puzzle game with added depth. You control only one player block on the board and swap places with the blocks around it to form matches and clear the blocks. The powerful Metamorphosis mode turns the rules upside down and helps achieve massive scores and climb the online leaderboards.

There are countless ways to improve your skills. Plus, there are a lot of underlying rules to discover to really drive up the scores. With the 3 game modes and 3 worlds, there are 9 leaderboards available for friendly competition.

Once you get the hang of it, it is possible to just play and zone out, too!

Enjoy!

Game Modes

  • "Meditate" is for players who want to take their time and play without any stress.
  • In "Sprint" you have to really speed up and see what score you can achieve in a short amount of time.
  • "Arcade" sits in between - a practically endless game mode that gets more difficult with each level.
These 3 game modes can be played on each of the 3 worlds. They also have their specific characteristics, so each combination is a unique experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2 Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For the leaderboards to work, the Steam client must be running in the background.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meta Match is a unique take on the popular match-3 formula. Move the player block across the board and swap places with neighbouring blocks. Unleash the power of Metamorphosis mode and let the scores soar to unimagined heights!
